name: BREAKER 1600
description:
Breaker 1600: A game about a robot breaking into a facility and destroying every enemy.

Made for the Palette Jam 2. Theme: BREAK

CONTROLS:
A/D to move
Space Bar to jump
Left click to Shoot
P/Esc to pause

Tools used:
Engine: Unity
Art: Piskel
Audio: sxfr
Font: Pixel Emulator

Credits:

All Art Assets were made by me.

Colors used:
